meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Loren Lee Chen Derek Anderson Sean Harrington Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7452.

td.p: Loren Lee Chen, a basketball podcaster from West Newton, Massachusetts
Derek Anderson, an attorney from Falls Church, Virginia
Sean Harrington, an engineer from Houston, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,200)

tr.td: IN THE WORLD CAPITAL
WARTHOGS
STUPID ANSWERS
SAY IT IN ITALIAN
THE DEVILS
DEEP BLUE "C"
